"Maximals don't use others. We save them from being confused and turned into 
weapons. But if you didn't want to fight in this war, you could have a 
secluded base, I'm sure that a good friend of mine, Rachel would enjoy your 
company," Snow Stalker says, hoping to reason with Night Blade.
